description: ADIC is a tool for the automatic differentiation (AD) of programs written in ANSI C. Given the source code and a user's specification of dependent and independent variables, ADIC generates an augmented C code that computes the partial derivatives of all of the specified dependent variables with respect to all of the specified independent variables in addition to the original result.
name: ADIC
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
